title: Why can the pbe have all languages packs while other servers only have some?

replies.body: PBE is not specific to a single region, for example there are EU players as well as NA.  There's a variety of language packs to support that!  Check our our [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) guide for more info.
like zeke said, i'm sure there're a lot of people speaking other languages in different regions. What changes if you get the choice of choosing your language on a server? Nothing brokes right?

Hey, so I don't have the context to offer answers to these concerns but I do hear you.   Player support doesn't have context or visibility on server operations or the language used, and I'm not going to try and make an incorrect guess.  I recommend using Ask Riot to field your question to the proper team, or discuss this on the [gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards.

i can't ask riot lol. i press "ask riot" it tells me i have to login, then it does its things and brings me to https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/ i then go to ask riot again, and it tells me i have to login again. It's an infinite loop. Is it because i'm from the EUW? I tried changing it to EUW but it always brings me to NA

Might be an extension issue, or you may need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  If that doesn't work, see if another browser or Incognito works.   

After you are able to login, our [articles have an Ask link](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/10/ask-riot-pre-season-edition/) which will open a small pop up window to submit your question.

Quick question why does Riot not support French and Spanish on NA. It seems odd seeing as French is the official language of Canada and Haiti while Spanish is the official language of Mexico and several other countries ( full list here http://download.travlang.com/Ergane/northam.htm ).  Approximately 6,000,000 people speak French and another 99,520,000 speak Spanish.

This is a good  question, but I'm not part of the team that would have visibility on this.  I recommend asking this on[ Ask Riot ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/tag/ask-riot)to get more context or consider your suggestion.
